Packages
Package
Description
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore
 
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.commands.executables
Classes relating to the execution of Commands within CuriosityCore Plugins.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.commands.executables.interfaces
Interfaces utilised within the CommandExecutable child classes.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.commands.inputs
Classes that allow for more streamlined containment of inputs and parameters for Commands executed within CuriosityCore Plugins.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.commands.managers
Classes related to managing commands within CuriosityCore Plugins utilising this library.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.commands.managers.interfaces
Interfaces utilised within the CommandManager Child Classes.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.configurations
Classes relevant to the caching, retrieval and manipulation of data found within user-defined configuration files.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.configurations.cached
Classes relevant to the initialisation of cached configuration data.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.configurations.interfaces
Interfaces responsible for the behaviour of classes relevant to the storing of cached configuration data.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.configurations.test.configs.caches
 
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.configurations.test.configs.enums
 
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.configurations.test.configs.managers
 
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.database
Classes relevant to the caching, reading and writing of data from databases such as SQL and Redis.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.database.credentials
Classes relevant to the authentication of a request to a database.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.database.mysql.queries
Classes relevant to querying SQL databases.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.database.mysql.table
Classes relevant to the caching of a table from an SQL database.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.inventorymenus.buttons
Classes relevant to custom buttons utilised by inventory menus.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.inventorymenus.handlers
Classes relevant to the handling of custom inventories
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.inventorymenus.listeners
Listeners responsible for custom inventory events.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.inventorymenus.managers
Classes responsible for managing custom inventories.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.inventorymenus.palette
Classes related to the palette of buttons found within inventory menus.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.messages.enums
Enumerations to facilitate the creation of CuriosityCore stamps and to serve as examples.
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.messages.format
Interfaces responsible for the creation of Adventure Components from raw values
